meanings.definition: The act of cutting off the head of a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The decapitations in the movie were very shocking.
meanings.sent2: The decapitations in the story led to a sense of fear among the characters.
meanings.sent3: The decapitations in the play were so exaggerated, it made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The decapitations in the legend were described as swift and merciless.
meanings.sent5: The decapitations in the history book were depicted with graphic detail.

meanings.definition: The result of cutting off the head of a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The decapitations found in the forest were a gruesome sight.
meanings.sent2: The decapitations of the statues left a haunting impression on the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The decapitations of the snowmen in the yard puzzled the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The decapitations of the flowers by the storm were a sad sight.
meanings.sent5: The decapitations of the dolls in the attic seemed eerie in the dim light.
